languages.text: "За здравие корабля уже можно молиться, но за упокой пока рановато. Мои ремонтники уже работают в пострадавших отсеках, справимся!"
"The ship could use a prayer or two right now, but it's too early for a funeral! My repairmen are already hard at work fixing the damaged compartments. We can and we will make it!"
languages.original_text: "За здравие корабля уже можно молиться, но за упокой пока рановато. Мои ремонтники уже работают в пострадавших отсеках, справимся!"

traits.locale_text: "It is about time we pray for the vessel's health. It definitely is too early to pray for its funeral, my repairmen are already working in the affected compartments. We can and will make it!"
"It is about time we pray for the vessel's health. It definitely is too early to pray for its funeral, my repairmen are already working in the affected compartments. We can and will make it!"
"The hour has come to pray for the ship's recovery, but not for its funeral! My repairmen are already hard at work fixing the damaged compartments. We can and we will make it!"
"The hour has come to pray for the ship's recovery, but not for its funeral! My repairmen are already hard at work fixing the damaged compartments. We can and we will make it!"
"The ship could use a prayer or two right now, but it's too early for a funeral! My repairmen are already hard at work fixing the damaged compartments. We can and we will make it!"

languages.text: «A la nave le vendría bien una oración, ¡pero es demasiado pronto para pensar en funerales! Mis reparadores se están esforzando por arreglar los compartimentos dañados. ¡Podemos triunfar y lo haremos!».
languages.original_text: "The ship could use a prayer or two right now, but it's too early for a funeral! My repairmen are already hard at work fixing the damaged compartments. We can and we will make it!"

traits.locale_text: «A la nave le vendría bien una oración, ¡pero es demasiado pronto para pensar en funerales! Mis reparadores se están esforzando por arreglar los compartimentos dañados. ¡Podemos triunfar y lo haremos!».

languages.text: 「本船には祈りのひとつやふたつは必要だが、葬式を出すにはまだ早い！修理工たちは、全力で損傷した区画の修理に取りかかっている！我々は生き延びられる、生き延びるぞ！」
languages.original_text: "The ship could use a prayer or two right now, but it's too early for a funeral! My repairmen are already hard at work fixing the damaged compartments. We can and we will make it!"

traits.locale_text: 「本船には祈りのひとつやふたつは必要だが、葬式を出すにはまだ早い！修理工たちは、全力で損傷した区画の修理に取りかかっている！我々は生き延びられる、生き延びるぞ！」

languages.text: “这艘船确实需要进行祈祷，但现在还不是举行葬礼的时候！我的维修工人正在努力修理损坏的船舱。我们能做到！我们一定能修好！”
languages.original_text: "The ship could use a prayer or two right now, but it's too early for a funeral! My repairmen are already hard at work fixing the damaged compartments. We can and we will make it!"

traits.locale_text: “这艘船确实需要进行祈祷，但现在还不是举行葬礼的时候！我的维修工人正在努力修理损坏的船舱。我们能做到！我们一定能修好！”

languages.text: "Das Schiff könnte jetzt ein oder zwei Gebete vertragen, aber für eine Bestattung ist es noch zu früh! Meine Mechaniker sind bereits dabei, die beschädigten Abteilungen zu reparieren. Wir können und werden es schaffen!"
languages.original_text: "The ship could use a prayer or two right now, but it's too early for a funeral! My repairmen are already hard at work fixing the damaged compartments. We can and we will make it!"

traits.locale_text: "Das Schiff könnte jetzt ein oder zwei Gebete vertragen, aber für eine Bestattung ist es noch zu früh! Meine Mechaniker sind bereits dabei, die beschädigten Abteilungen zu reparieren. Wir können und werden es schaffen!"

languages.text: « Le vaisseau aurait bien besoin d'une prière ou deux, c'est sûr, mais il est encore trop tôt pour l'enterrer ! Mes gars sont déjà en train de réparer les compartiments endommagés. On peut, et on va y arriver ! »
languages.original_text: "The ship could use a prayer or two right now, but it's too early for a funeral! My repairmen are already hard at work fixing the damaged compartments. We can and we will make it!"

traits.locale_text: « Le vaisseau aurait bien besoin d'une prière ou deux, c'est sûr, mais il est encore trop tôt pour l'enterrer ! Mes gars sont déjà en train de réparer les compartiments endommagés. On peut, et on va y arriver ! »

string_traits.trait: Встраивание генокрадов и офицеров в мейнсюжет 2
